ViewStack.VBox:
<Button text="'Random slide'" on-click="
                var direction : Array = ['left', 'right', 'top', 'bottom'];
                var trans     : $Slide = new $Slide();
                trans.duration  = 0.25;
                trans.direction = direction[ Std.random(direction.length) ];

                #ViewStack(vs).trans = trans;
                #ViewStack(vs).show('page2');
            "/>

VBox.name: 'page2'
